name: Bachelor Party Makeover,spa,Dressup free games
description:
This cool girl is spending her Saturday night at a very fancy party. She was invited here by a really handsome boy and she wants to look wonderful for him tonight. She dreams to win his heart forever and for that she wants to look really beautiful and stylish & attractive. Give her a helping hand and choose the fanciest outfit for her to wear at this party, make her try on some of these cool clothes and pick up the combination you like best. She would also like to change her hairstyle and some cool accessories, so pick up the ones that make her look perfect.

Spa
Makeover
Dressup
Hairstyle.

Download now ....
